However, she can also be found atThe Old Bacchus Place, where she appears to live withTheodore Eaves. She is also found atRidgewood Farm, where she also seems to live, even sleeping there, along withGladys FeaneyandEunis Randle.

name: Mother Superior Calderón
description: Sister Calderón had a husband who, prior to 1899, "died a long time ago", including a mother. Her mother gave her a crucifix when she was a novice, shortly before she passed away.Sister Calderón became a nun based in the city ofSaint Denisat some point prior to 1899. She moved to Mexico in late 1899, by boarding a train atEmerald Station. Her reasoning for moving to Mexico was that she was "finally sent on a mission", presumably by thechurch.

description: Little is known about Lydia's background, save that she appears to work as a prostitute. She had a boyfriend by the timeUndead Nightmaretakes place, but he was killed by theundead.

attributes.Location: Nuevo Paraíso

name: Mummies
description: Mummies only appear in theEscalera Catacombs. They are long-dead Aztecs, possibly slaves, who were sacrificed during an ancient period. They are beyond recognition of gender; they are just shambling grayish creatures. It will be difficult to kill them due to the dark nature of the catacombs and they can only be differentiated by the red eyes they have. A good way to annihilate them is by using theDead Eye.

name: Herbert Moon
description: Herbert Moon is the owner of theGeneral Storein the town ofArmadilloinCholla Springs,New Austin. He had a brother named Francis Moon, who died on 23 May 1897, and is buried inCoot's Chapelcemetery, with his tombstone saying he "always took a joke too far". Herbert also has a daughter named Herberta, whom he disowned after she married a Jewish man named Isaac Solomons, and dedicated herself to helping the poor instead of selling groceries.

As she is the same as all the otherundeadthere, if you throw an explosive weapon such as aFire BottleorDynamite, the Undead will attack or be killed.
